markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Yamaraj's Grandeur](/Feats.aspx?ID=2366) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You have been granted a sliver of the power of the [yamaraj](/Monsters.aspx?ID=770), the magistrates of the dead who agreed to allow duskwalkers to exist at all. You exhale a blast of icy wind and ravenous insects. This is a 30-foot cone that deals 14d6 slashing damage and 4d6 [persistent slashing damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) (basic Reflex save using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). On a critical failure, targets also become [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34).
name: Yamaraj's Grandeur
